mapper.select: SELECT da.address FROM alq_doctor_attachment AS da WHERE da.user_id = #{id} AND da.type = 2 AND da.user_type = 2
SELECT spe.id, spe.head_url, spe.office, spe.position, spe.employer, spe.name, spe.sex, spe.detail FROM alq_specialist AS spe WHERE spe.id = #{specialistId}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.created_time, ca.id caId, ca.address FROM alq_consultation AS c LEFT JOIN alq_consultation_attachment AS ca ON c.id = ca.consultation_id WHERE c.title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{office}, '%'))
